@AmesforJakes Personally, I never really liked any of the men in the Bridgerton books so Michael being Michaela doesn’t really bother me. It does feel a bit like Jess Brownell is slightly self inserting into Francesca’s story, but it’s not even a bad change, I still think it can be cute.
